name: Central Park
description:: A vast green oasis in New York City, offering numerous recreational activities and scenic beauty.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: An iconic symbol of freedom, this colossal sculpture stands on Liberty Island.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: A famous iron lattice tower in Paris, one of the most recognizable structures.

name: Great Wall of China
description: A historic series of walls and fortifications spanning across northern China.
